parse.title: Cyprus in the Eurovision Song Contest 1985

text.*:
This article needs additional citations for verification. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. (December 2015) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)
Eurovision Song Contest 1985
Country  Cyprus
National selection
Selection process Internal Selection
Selected entrant Lia Vissi
Selected song ""To katalava arga""
Finals performance
Final result 16th, 15 points
Cyprus in the Eurovision Song Contest
◄1984 • 1985 • 1987►

Cyprus was represented by the artist Lia Vissi, with the song "To katalava arga", at the 1985 Eurovision Song Contest, which took place on 4 May in Gothenburg, Sweden. The song was chosen internally by broadcaster CyBC.

At Eurovision[edit]

On the night of the final Vissi performed 3rd in the running order, following Finland and preceding Denmark. At the close of voting, "To katalava arga" had received 15 points, placing Cyprus 16th of the 19. The Cypriot jury awarded its 12 points to Germany.[1]

See also[edit]

  • Cyprus in the Eurovision Song Contest
  • Eurovision Song Contest 1985

References[edit]

  1. ^ ESC History - Cyprus 1985
